Sequence Information.Peptide Name: CA(1-13)M(1-13) (Synthetic AMPs, hybrid peptide, cecropin A(1-13)+melittin(1-13), XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (86.67%) toCA(1-13)M(1-18)K:23%; V: 12%, L=G: 15%.Activity: lethal concentration (LC): active against E. coli D21 (LC 0.5 uM), P. aeruginosa OT97 (LC 1 uM), B. subtilis (LC 0.7 uM), S. aureus Cowan 1 (LC 2 uM), and S. pyogenes (LC 1 uM).  ActivityG: D=L.Antimalarial activity:P. falciparum (IC50 17 uM). ActivityP:L>D.In vitro toxicity: sheep RBC (LC >500 uM), not hemo.lytic.

Literature Information.Title: Antibacterial and antimalarial properties of peptides that are cecropin-melittin hybrids
